title: Morgan Jones (rugby union)
text:
Morgan Jones (born 23 May 1999) is a Welsh <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> and <a href="European%20Rugby%20Champions%20Cup">European Rugby Champions Cup</a> side <a href="Scarlets">Scarlets</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>.
Scarlets.
Jones signed his first professional contract for Scarlets in August 2020. He made his Scarlets debut in Round 3 of the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2020–21 Pro14</a> against <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton</a>.
